message: I have a great product that I think you'll love, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out on this opportunity!
I'm interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8500. This is my final offer on that price, but I'm open to negotiating further if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but $8500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're not on the same page, Bob. I'm not willing to go as low as $7000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $8000, but that's my absolute limit. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
